tool_description: API returns climate crisis news from diverse set of newspapers
name: Climate Crisis News
title: Climate Crisis News

api_list.name: Get Climate Crisis News By Newspaper
api_list.description: Returns all Climate Crisis news from a specific Newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-crisis-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-crisis-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-crisis-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-crisis-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Crisis News
api_list.description: Returns back all news about Climate Crisis.
